comment: The membership (epsilon) relation and its converse are disjoint, i.e., ` _E ` is an asymmetric relation. Variable-free version of ~ en2lp . (Proposed by BJ, 18-Jun-2022.) (Contributed by AV, 19-Jun-2022.)
